Xiaoshu

  • The traditional East Asian calendars divide a year into 24 solar terms (節氣). Xiǎoshǔ (pīnyīn) or Shōsho (rōmaji) () is the 11th solar term.

以上来源于: Wikipedia

    周六，李晓姝（右）与她的同事在位于科尼岛的美食胜餐厅打暑期工。
